modName: Balbors SkyRe Plugin for Omegared99s Armor Compilation v3-6
summary: SkyRe Plugin for Omegared99s Armo rCompilation Mod to work better with 0.99.21.1 version of Skyrim Redone
descriptionHtml:
This Mod is purly for those who wish to try the 0.99.21 version of T3nd0\'s Skyrim Redone Mod but cannot live without Omegared99s Armor Compilation. Its is still considered Beta.

I made this patch using the original SkyRe_Plugin_Omegared99sArmorCompilation.esp to work better with 0.99.21 version of  T3nd0\'s Skyrim Redone Mod which changed the vanilla armour values and added a new perk, Leathercraft to the Smithing tree.

[b]To install:[/b] 
1 Make sure you already have Skyrim Redone 0.99.21.1 and Omegared99s ArmorCompilation 3.6 mod installed. (Should be ok with 0.99.21.2 as well)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url] by T3nd0
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277]Omegared99 - Armor Compilation[/url] by Omegared99

2 Install my mod
[b]WARNING!!!![/b]  - I have changed the file name of the Plug-in it is now [b]SkyRe_Plugin_Omegared99sACv3_6.esp[/b] 
Turn off the old [b]SkyRe_Plugin_Omegared99sArmorCompilation.esp[/b] file.

Version 1.2 and version 1.1.4 are exactly the same except for the file name is Different

[b]If you are using Wrye Bash you MUST rebuild your Bash Patch[/b]

Make sure this file appears below the Skyrim_main.esp in the load order. Game will not load if it is above  Skyrim_main.esp.

[b]NOTE:[/b] 
I have not yet touched the Omegared99 weapons Plugin by Yaushee aka Mastata and do not have it turned on. I do not know if this works with 0.99.21

[b]User of BOSS:[/b] 
BOSS will place the plug-in in the wrong position for running the game. After running BOSS use WRYE BASH OR NMM to move it to below the Skyrim_main.esp in the load order. The reason this happens is because my plug-in has the same file name as T3nd0\'s original plug-in for SkyRe, I\'m not sure how to fix this other than remain my file name which I will do in 1.2.

[b]Armour base stats and crafting skill:[/b] 
Mercenary	Armour		21	Leathercraft perk
Armor of the White Tree	20	Leathercraft perk
Spellweaver Armour		21	Elven Armor perk
Lannister Guard Armour	28	Advanced Armor perk
Arena Mage Armour		19	Leathercraft perk
Thane Armour			22	Steel Smithing perk
BattleMage Armour		24	Elven Smithing perk
Ranger Armour			32	Glass Armor perk

Iron Island Armour		24	Steel Smithing perk
Winterfell Armour		40	Orc Smithing perk
Champion Armour		46	Daedric Smithing perk
DragonBane Armour		42	Dragon Smithing perk
Armor of the Mountain		45	Ebony Smithing perk
Warmage Armour			35	Dwarven Smithing perk

[b]History:[/b] 

version 1
Initial release to work with SkyRe 0.99.20.1 to make use of the Leathercraft perk

Version 1.1
Update to work with SkyRe 0.99.21 (no longer available)

Version 1.1.1
Update to work with SkyRe 0.99.21.1
Fixed incorrect armour value for Armour of the White Tree, Mercenary Boots and Thane Armour Gauntlets.

1.1.2
Fixed master file order

1.1.3
Fixed more master file load order problems which cause a heap of problems such as multiple items showing up

1.1.4
Changed Mercenary Armour to Leathercraft Perk
Fixed Crafting Meltdown perk requirements
Changed Base value of Mercenary Armour from 22 to 21
Changed Base value of Spellweaver Armour from 22 to 21
Changed Component of Thane Armour from Iron to Steel
Changed Component of Mercenary Armour from Steel to Iron

1.2
File Name Change so hopefully BOSS will place mod in correct place.

:[b]Other Mods By me:[/b] 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Balbors SkyRe Plugin for Immersive Armors V6[/url] Now Hosted on the Immersive Armors page as the official SkyRe Plug-in

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27092]Balbors SkyRe Plugins[/url]
author: Balbor
